{{Disambiguation}}

'''End Portal''' may refer to:

== Blocks ==

* {{BlockLink|End Portal (block)|id=end-portal}}, the block that is created when an end portal is activated
* {{BlockLink|End Portal Frame}}, the blocks that make up the frame of end portals
* {{BlockLink|End Gateway (block)|id=end-gateway}}, the block that makes up end gateway portals

== Structures ==
* {{EnvLink|End portal}}, a structure found in strongholds that can be used to travel to the End
* {{EnvLink|Exit portal}}, a structure that returns players back to the Overworld from the End
* {{EnvLink|End Gateway}}, the portal created after defeating the ender dragon
